attributes.action: Parliament to intervene with new failed £16.5m Elmbridge Court roundabout, Glos
attributes.background: The new Elmbridge Court roundabout on the outskirts of Gloucester cost a total of £16.5m. It was promised that the new roundabout would ease congestion. It has, in fact done the opposite and created traffic far worse than when the old roundabout was in operation.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
